author: kpreisser
msg: - Prevent recursive invocation of Runnables by Room.invokeAndWait() to prevent errors like ConcurrentModificationException when Room.broadcastRoomMessage() iterates over an ArrayList and then calls Room.invokeAndWait() recursivly, iterating again over the array.
- Add comment about blocking Session.close() method.

author: arp
msg: HDFS-5398. NameNode changes to process storage reports per storage directory.

author: kpreisser
